name: Empower Tee

description: Handcrafted with love, this bracelet symbolizes strength and solidarity. Wear it proudly.

name: Her Story Book
description: A powerful collection of stories from girls who’ve overcome adversity and found their voice.

description: Warm, stylish, and bold — this hoodie wraps you in comfort and purpose.

description: Pink tee with bold 'Empowered Women Empower Women' text. Soft, stylish, and purpose-driven.

name: Girls Can Be Anything
